headline: Cognizant (CTSH) Valuation Check After New AI Partnerships and India Innovation Lab Expansion
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) just rolled out a string of AI focused moves, highlighted by a multi year strategic partnership with Microsoft and fresh long term deals with Bupa Hong Kong, ERIKS and BayWa. See our latest analysis for Cognizant Technology Solutions. Those moves are landing in a market that has already been repricing Cognizant, with a 90 day share price return of 25.92 percent and a three year total shareholder return of 59.81 percent, signalling that momentum has been...
